item.description:
Ride For Blue Motorcycle Ride
When: Saturday September 25th 2010 | Registration at 9:00 am. Ride leaves at 11:00 am.
Where: 1014 Pearl Street, Brockton, MA

Join us for our annual motorcycle ride through the back roads of Easton and West Bridgewater.
Registration starts at 9:00 am at JM Pet Resort, 1014 Pearl Street in Brockton. The ride leaves as 11:00am. Enjoy a one hour ride led by the Brockton Blue Knights, and police escorted.

The ride will end back at the Resort. Enjoy a cookout, live music from our official house band Milk & Bones and RAFFLES!

Ride cost is $25 and includes a t-shirt while supplies last.


Meeting spot: Panera Bread in Hingham

Meeting time: 830 am Ride leaves at 900 am to go to the registration location together

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Blue Dog Shelter ride
